page.title: 14THE CARING COMMUNITY.
page.content: {POLICE. Bellingham police cover an area of 650 square miles.Stationed in Bellingham itself are 4 constables and 1 sergeant.They give advice about crime prevention as well as dealing with criminal matters.They like to be involved in the community socially. {AMBULANCE SERVICE. There are two ambulances based in Bellingham with 5 drivers.All are fully qualified. {FIRE SERVICE. The fire station is open for 24 hours a day,with 12 part-time firemen always on call.The firemen do 2 hours training on a Tuesday evening.During the summer 2 engines are based in Bellingham to cope with forest fires and to attend accidents caused by the influx of summer visitors.
